title: IQR of a Boxplot: Mark's Pushups
question_text:
Mark started working out, and every day he recorded the number of pushups he could do in a row.
According to the boxplot, what is the approximate interquartile range (IQR) of the numbers?
solution:
The interquartile range (IQR) represents Q3-Q1.

In this case, it is approximately: $90-27=63$.

Explanation of Distractors Choice 'A' is incorrect as this represents the interval of the data set. Choice 'B' is incorrect as this represents the interval from Quartile 1 to Quartile 3. Choice 'C' is incorrect as this represents half the range. Choice 'E' is incorrect as this represents the range(maximum value - minimum value).
